db:info.db:title: Qt Quick Item as Texture Example

db:abstract.db:para: A simple cube with a Qt Quick item as a texture.
This documentation was introduced in QtCanvas3D 1.0.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml quick
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/canvas3d/$$TARGET INSTALLS += target
SOURCES += main.cpp
RESOURCES += quickitemtexture.qrc
OTHER_FILES += qml/quickitemtexture/* \ doc/src/* \ doc/images/*
